wikipedia_page.main: Phil Daley (born 12 April 1967) is a former footballer who played as a forward in the Football League.He started his League career at Wigan Athletic. He made 161 league appearances for the club and scored 39 goals.In August 1994 he moved to  Lincoln City.

response: Phil Daley (born 1 April 1964) is an Australian former premiership-winning and representative rugby league footballer who played in the 1980s and 1990s. His club career was played with the Manly-Warringah Sea Eagles and the Gold Coast.  His position of choice was at prop forward.
Daley is the son of Doug Daley, a former Manly-Warringah player as well as the treasurer and secretary of the club. Phil Daley's son, Ben plays Rugby union for the Queensland Reds.
